name: Character Studio Biped File
summary: Learn about .BIP files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions:
Opening .bip files typically involves using Autodesk’s 3ds Max software, which supports the Character Studio Biped plugin. Here’s how you can open .bip files:

Use Autodesk 3ds Max: This software supports .bip files through its Character Studio Biped plugin.Load Plugin: Ensure the Character Studio Biped plugin is enabled in 3ds Max.Import or Merge: Go to File > Import or File > Merge, navigate to your .bip file, and select it.Adjust Settings: Modify animation parameters as needed within 3ds Max.Save or Export: Save your project or export the modified .bip file for use in other projects.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
